https://tmrev.io/movie/158932-Dragon Tales - Sing and Dance in Dragonland 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Favorite musical moments from the popular children's television series Dragon Tales are collected on this special home-video release. Dragon Tales: Sing and Dance in Dragonland features 20 songs from the show, with easy-to-read singalong lyrics appearing onscreen so kids of all ages can join in the musical fun. Dragon Tales - Sing and Dance in Dragonland
